definitions.definition: the act of communicating with somebody, especially while you work, play or spend time with them
definitions.sensetop: interaction (between A and B)interaction (of A) (with B)

examples.text: the interaction between performers and their audience

definitions.definition: if one thing has an interaction with another, or if there is an interaction between two things, the two things have an effect on each other
definitions.sensetop: interaction (between A and B)interaction (of A) (with B)

examples.text: the interaction of bacteria with the body’s natural chemistry
